about_the_game:
Des Racines et des Graines (Roots and Seeds but in french) is a garden game where the player will explore an island with different species of plants and trees. Each day you're uncovering this new environment and its history. You will gather some seeds from the vegetation and re-plant them close to each other to get hybrids. Day after day, you will cross-breed the plants to create some new ones, to finally find and restore the ultimate tree : Yggdrasil.

. Enjoy a free cozy game
. Explore a beautifull hand-draw island
. Experiment with mysterious plants
. Gaming experience around 1h


Please note, due to its short playing experience and its production over 48 hours, the game does not offer a saving system.

Some sounds were produced by digifishmusic, klankbeeld, Noted451, DBS_Sounds, cupido-1 & jgrzinich and distributed by FreeSound.

short_description: A garden game where you will explore a calm and peaceful island. Gather some seeds from the vegetation and re-plant them close to each other to get hybrids. Day after day, you will cross-breed the plants to create some new ones, to finally find and restore the ultimate tree: Yggdrasil.
